laserschein
Class AbstractLaserOutput

java.lang.Object
  laserschein.AbstractLaserOutput
Direct Known Subclasses:
EasylaseUsb2Adaptor, LD2000Adaptor
public abstract class AbstractLaserOutput
extends java.lang.Object

AbstractLaserOutput defines the minimum functionality for an adaptor to a laser hardware interface.

Author:
allesblinkt

Method Detail

initialize

public abstract void initialize()
Initializes the driver and other stuff. Gets called once when Laserschein is initialized.

draw

public abstract void draw(LaserFrame theFrame)
This gets called for every frame to be displayed.

Parameters:
theFrame - to be displayed

destroy

public abstract void destroy()
This gets called when the processing application shuts down. A good place to unload DLLs and clean up.

getMaximumNumberOfPoints

public abstract int getMaximumNumberOfPoints()
Returns the maximum number of points per frame supported by the laser device. Note: This is fixed for some devices and dynamic for others...

Returns:
The maximum number of points per frame

getScanSpeed

public int getScanSpeed()
Get the current scan speed.

Returns:
The scan speed in PPS

Set the scan speed for the frames to follow

Parameters:
theSpeed - in PPS
